name: Hold it !
description:
Hold it ! is a game about ... holding blocks ! Choose your character and try to make it to the final level - play with your mouse, press Escape key to go back to the main menu. 

Hold it ! was made with Game maker studio 2, during ludum dare 49 from oct 1 to oct 4 with the theme "Unstable"
